title: Why do i always get either a camille yasuo or zed that will always ks me

replies.body: Ks no big deal generally.  Unless they are being dicks about it,  just get on with the game.

Because certain kind of champions tend to attract certain kind of players.

But other than that, a lot of times it's not kill steal but kill secure. There is a difference.
i dont think coming in and aa to kill STEAL when i won the fight counts

All three have nothing on lux support

Oh youve just blown summoners,ult and are a one ability or auto away from getting a kill? Oh let me 'help' you
Because the only thing a yasuo can do is literally steal kills
